isPartOf.name: RegDEEP™ - Regulatory Decoding & Explanation for Exam Purpose™
SEBI NRI Re-KYC Geo-Tag: RegDEEP Exam+Industry FREE PDF
isPartOf.description: FREE PDF: RegDEEP™ Quick Exam Revision & Industry Note - SEBI Circular (Dec 10, 2025): Relaxation on Geo-tagging for NRIs during Re-KYC. A Compact 2-in-1 RegDEEP guide Exam decoding + Industry actions for the latest SEBI update. Designed for NISM aspirants, MF distributors, RIAs, brokers, banks, fintechs, and all intermediaries using KYC/Re-KYC. Section 1: NISM Exam Aspirants- Snapshot summary, Exam essentials & high-yield points, Remember this distinctions, Likely MCQ triggers, and Clause → NISM Series mapping. Section 2: Industry Note All Intermediaries: Snapshot & operational meaning, Immediate action items, Implementation mapping table, Tech-Product checklist, Compliance notes, and Escalation matrix guidance.

isPartOf.headline: SEBI's Dec 2025 CIrcular Eases On NRI Re-KYC Geo-Tag Explained: NISM Exam & Industry Notes  -  RegDEEP™ Decoding | FAQs | Glossary | FREE PDF Micro Summary
isPartOf.description: An exam-focused and industry-oriented analysis of SEBI's Dec 10, 2025 circular easing geo-tagging requirements for NRIs during re-KYC; includes clause breakdown, NISM exam relevance, operational notes and sample MCQs.

isBasedOn.name: SEBI Circular - Relaxation on Geo-Tagging Requirement in India for NRIs while undertaking re-KYC (Dec 2025)

usageInfo: This structured data entry represents an educational summary and regulatory decoding under RegDEEP. It is not an official SEBI circular. Refer to the regulator’s website for authoritative information.

hasPart.name: RegTechChecklist JSON Schema
hasPart.text: {"$schema":"https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema","title":"RegTechChecklist","description":"Dataset schema for mapping regulatory categories, requirements, and notes for SEBI NRI Re-KYC Geo-Tag Relaxation.","type":"object","properties":{"regtech_checklist":{"type":"array","description":"List of regulatory and tech compliance requirements.","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","description":"Unique row identifier"},"category":{"type":"string","description":"Category of compliance or regulatory focus area"},"requirement":{"type":"string","description":"Specific requirement or action item"},"regulatory_notes":{"type":"string","description":"Additional regulatory expectations or compliance notes"}},"required":["id","category","requirement","regulatory_notes"]}}},"required":["regtech_checklist"],"examples":[{"regtech_checklist":[{"id":1,"category":"Policy Updates","requirement":"Reference SEBI Circular (Dec 10, 2025)","regulatory_notes":"Update internal KYC policy; version control; maintain audit evidence"},{"id":2,"category":"AML / KYC Matrices","requirement":"Include GPS mismatch as explicit risk event","regulatory_notes":"Document overrides; retain review trail"},{"id":3,"category":"Tech Checklist","requirement":"API contracts with KUA/KRA updated for conditional GPS validation","regulatory_notes":"Maintain audit logs (user-id/device-id/operator-id)"},{"id":4,"category":"Data Retention","requirement":"Logs stored in WORM/signed storage","regulatory_notes":"Keep retention policy accessible for supervisory review"},{"id":5,"category":"Training","requirement":"Staff training on new Re-KYC flow","regulatory_notes":"Record session logs + sign-offs as audit evidence"}]}]}
